390480.name: Starlight Drifter - Wallpapers & BG Selector
390480.description:
This DLC pack contains two items.

1. A selection of 1080p Wallpapers.
2. An in-game Background Selector.

1. Wallpapers:


All of the CG scenes from Starlight Drifter will be provided as 1080p wallpapers, including other promotional images and items from development, as the game is currently in Early Access, we will regularly add new wallpapers to this DLC pack as new CG scenes are created for the game. Package currently contains 24 separate wallpapers in high resolution .png format.

The wallpaper pack once purchased will be downloaded as a new Wallpapers folder in the games base directory, new wallpapers will be added regularly throughout early access.

2. Background Selector


Once purchased and installed a new option will be available on the main menu, where you will be able to select a background of your choice to appear on the main menu, currently the game is in early access so only a few wallpapers are available as optional background images. However as development continues this will be augmented to give you full access to all wallpapers as optional backgrounds.

Once purchased this item will automatically appear in the game.
